subject: Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Cleveland Browns wide receiver Josh Gordon was arrested and charged with driving while intoxicated after speeding down a street in Raleigh, N.C., around 3 a.m. Saturday, bringing his already cloudy future into more doubt.
snippet: Cleveland Browns wide receiver Josh Gordon was arrested and charged with driving while intoxicated after speeding down a street in Raleigh, N.C., around 3 a.m. Saturday, bringing his already cloudy future into more doubt.
